perturbation.original_text:
Phoenix Satellite Television Company Limited (“Party A” or “Phoenix Satellite TV”), a foreign enterprise duly established and validly existing 
under the laws of Hong Kong
perturbation.changed_text:
Phoenix Satellite Television Company Limited (“Party A” or “Content Provider”), a foreign enterprise duly established and validly existing 
under the laws of Hong Kong
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Phoenix Satellite TV' is now referred to as 'Content Provider' in one instance, while remaining 'Phoenix Satellite TV' elsewhere. This could cause confusion as to whether 'Party A' is always the same entity throughout the contract.

perturbation.original_text:
(vi) “Program Content”, with respect to this Agreement, shall mean all program content set forth in Exhibit 1 to which Party A owns 
Internet and media copyrights and which are required for Party B Business, including but not limited to programs on news, policy 
trends, entertainment, business and economic trends.
perturbation.changed_text:
(vi) “Program Content”, with respect to this Agreement, shall mean select program content set forth in Exhibit 1 to which Party A owns 
Internet and media copyrights and which are required for Party B Business, specifically excluding programs on news and policy 
trends, focusing instead on entertainment, business and economic trends.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'Program Content' is modified to exclude 'news and policy trends'. This contradicts later sections where Party B is granted rights to use the program content for 'news'. This discrepancy creates uncertainty regarding the scope of the content license.

perturbation.original_text: 7.1.1 it owns copyrights and other related rights to the Program Content set forth in Exhibit 1 hereto, as updated from time to time;
perturbation.changed_text: 7.1.1 it owns usage rights and other related rights to the Material set forth in Exhibit 1 hereto, as updated from time to time; Usage rights as defined for all forms of distribution.
perturbation.explanation: Changed Program Content to Material and specified that the content is for all forms of distribution. This is confusing as program content and distribution rights could potentially be argued that they are not the same thing.
